NEW YORK, Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 
About smartwatch displaySmartwatch display is the thick/thin electronic display screen made up of glass, plastic, or other flexible substrates. These screens are lightweight and foldable. As the demand for user-friendly and ubiquitous displays is expected to increase, many industry participants are working toward the development of large and high-resolution displays for smartwatches. Such displays make the screen of these watches durable and resistant to damage and increase the amount of content that can be displayed. In the future, we estimate that out of the rigid and flexible displays, the latter will be an embedded part of a wide range of applications. Technavio's analysts forecast the revenue of the global smartwatch display market to grow at a CAGR of 151.8% in terms of revenue during 2014-2019. 
Covered in this reportThis report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global smartwatch display market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, it considers the total revenue generated from the shipments of smartwatch with the following display technologies: 
- LCD- OLEDThe report also covers market segmentation based on technology and geographical regions.Technavio's report, Global Smartwatch Display Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the landscape of market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
